description: O'Brien brace gives Devils win over Dundee
title: O'Brien brace gives Devils win over Dundee
title_page: O'Brien brace gives Devils win over Dundee - BBC Sport
maintext:
Cardiff Devils secured a second successive victory in the Elite League with a 3-1 win away to Dundee Stars on Sunday.
Cole Sanford and Zach O'Brien both had early chances for Devils before they went ahead on nine minutes through Cody Donaghey.
Zach O'Brien doubled the visitors lead and although Zachary Tsekos replied for Stars a second from O'Brien in the second period saw Devils secure victory.
Devils, who are fourth in the Elite League after the win, host Coventry Blaze on Friday evening.
